pages.text: $(thing)Input Hatches$() allow the input of compatible machines to be extended by placing the input hatch adjacent to the machine. Some change the available recipes, some make providing the needed inputs easier.

The input hatches of different kinds can be chained to each other.$(br)Placing them in between compatible machines or breaking parts of the link can jam the hatches. Using a $(item)Wrench$() on them should solve the issues.
